Default Template

Request URI: {{.RequestURI}}

Request URI (uppercase): {{.RequestURI | upper}}

Current time: {{now | date "2006-01-02 15:04:05"}}

Random UUID: {{uuidv4}}

This is the default template for unmatched requests.

Hugo/Sprig Template Functions Demo

  • String manipulation: {{"hello world" | title}}
  • Math: {{add 5 3}}
  • List operations: {{list "apple" "banana" "cherry" | join ", "}}
  • Conditional: {{if eq .RequestURI "/"}}Home page{{else}}Other page{{end}}
  • Default value: No value provided
